short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We assist you to do searches via internet without being tracked.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Privacy Tracker automatically discovers trackers and provide two options to the user. The user can block all the unwanted trackers that aren't required to load the website by single click or The user has another option to block some unwanted trackers manually according to their preference too. Thereafter, when you browser stops loading content from that type of source, it can no longer track you anymore.
